ninja.mirror.general.design.description: The goal of this project is to create a smart mirror with a modern design. Everyday functionalities such as a clock or calendar could not be missing here. The author also provided a weather module that can protect the user from forgetting an umbrella on that one unlucky day. Additionally, a module displaying motivational quotes at specific intervals and a resource monitor were added. Device can be connected to a regular 230V socket in the European standard. Frameless design and LED backlight make this product an eye-catcher.
ninja.mirror.software.section.descriptio:
I created simple page for this project before I found out about MagicMirror, which is an incredible time saver.
More information in the next section.
ninja.mirror.recommendation.section.desc: Before you decide to create your own mirror UI consider using MagicMirror open-source project. It has many interesting blocks and features to build your interface.

macropad.installation.description: Here is video describing the installation process. If you prefer text version, check below.
macropad.installation.step.1.title: Step 1: SSE server
macropad.installation.step.1.description: Java server application which allows your clients to communicate
macropad.installation.step.2.title: Step 2: PC driver
macropad.installation.step.2.description: Tool written in Python for executing actions
macropad.installation.step.3.title: Step 3: Mobile app
macropad.installation.step.3.description: Define actions you want to automate
macropad.installation.backend.docker.sta: Any next time you can just start already existing container:
macropad.installation.backend.docker.sto: And of course you can stop it this way:
macropad.installation.backend.docker.tro: Delete container (example for container with name "macropad-sse-server"):
macropad.installation.backend.legacy.run: Running legacy jar with custom port (i.e. 6060):
macropad.installation.backend.swagger.ui:
Backend also provides SwaggerUI page (you can find URL in logs).
It can be really helpful when debugging.
macropad.installation.driver.windows.nan: The "nano" command in the Windows installation section is only intended to point to the location of the file that is being changed at a given configuration step.
macropad.installation.driver.windows.git: Download project by executing git command:
macropad.installation.driver.windows.alt: Alternatively you can download archive from latest release, url below.
macropad.installation.driver.windows.pyt: After driver configuration (described in the next section) you can run driver with python command:
Download project by executing git command:
After driver configuration (described in the next section) you can run driver with python command:
macropad.installation.driver.linux.title: Linux (system-wide packages)
macropad.installation.driver.linux.git.d: Download project by executing git command:
macropad.installation.driver.linux.pytho: After driver configuration (described in the next section) you can run driver with python command:
macropad.installation.driver.mandatory.c: To enable transferring actions between our devices, we need to configure the connection data to the service launched in the previous step. This will allow us to register our device in the service and later select it in the mobile application.

When you click on an action defined in the mobile application, its identifier is passed by the server to the driver, which then executes the function defined for the action. Examples of action definitions with functions can be found in the file events_conf.example.py. Create your own file events_conf.py in the same location, which will contain your automations. Below is an example for an action with the identifier "RUN_INTELLIJ", which results in executing the keyboard shortcut Win + 2. Do not modify the driver to execute any command from the phone - this will put your computer at risk.
macropad.installation.driver.interactive: The macropad mobile app can automatically change the active workspace (active lower menu tab) depending on the currently active window on your computer. To make this possible, you must configure the driver accordingly. You will find step-by-step instructions below.
Allow a background thread to monitor the name of active window.
In the logs you can find the name of the active window - it will help you configure the active window monitor in the next step.

Read the file "windows_conf.example.py" and create a file in the same location called "windows_conf.py" based on it. This file is responsible for providing the set of conditional functions for activating specific tab in the application.
The function must return a logical true/false value - the condition for activating the application menu tab.
After registration mobile app in the logs you will find a list of available devices. Copy the name of your mobile device from it - it will be useful in the next step.
Specify which mobile device (list in the previous step or on the swagger page below) should interract to the change of the active window.
macropad.installation.mobile.android.pla: "Ninja Macropad" is available in Play Store and thanks to that can be easily installed on any Android device. After installation you have to go through several configuration steps, you can find configuration description below.
macropad.installation.mobile.android.con: You can freely configure the lower menu options (workspaces).
Full configuration is also available for action buttons. Create, edit, delete or change the order of your actions. In this case, you can also choose a photo from your gallery as an icon.
Provide a link to the service that is responsible for communication between your devices. The link should be in the following format:
When your device is registered, choose it as a "device to control". It allows you to easily change controlled device during work.

macropad.privacy.policy.page.title: Macropad Privacy Policy
macropad.privacy.policy.section.1.title: 1. Introduction
macropad.privacy.policy.section.1.desc.1: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through this Privacy Policy. This policy describes how we handle the information we collect when you use our application, which is available on the Google Play Store.
macropad.privacy.policy.section.1.desc.2: Since our app is designed to prioritize your privacy, we do not collect, share, or store any personal information.
macropad.privacy.policy.section.2.title: 2. Information We Do Not Collect
Does not collect any personal information, such as names, addresses, phone numbers, email addresses, or any other identifying information.
Does not track, monitor, or store any usage data or behavioral data about your interaction with the app.
Does not use third-party services that could collect or share information about you.
macropad.privacy.policy.section.3.title: 3. Local Storage on Device
macropad.privacy.policy.section.3.desc: All information associated with using this app is stored locally on your device. This means that any data created or managed within the app (such as settings or preferences) is saved solely on your device and is not accessible to us or any third party.
macropad.privacy.policy.section.4.title: 4. No Registration Required
macropad.privacy.policy.section.4.desc: We do not require registration, login, or any form of account creation to use the app. As such, we do not store any user credentials or information related to account authentication.
macropad.privacy.policy.section.5.title: 5. Data Security
macropad.privacy.policy.section.5.desc: Since all data is stored locally on your device, we rely on your device's security measures to protect your data. We recommend that you keep your device secure by using lock screen passwords and maintaining up-to-date software.
macropad.privacy.policy.section.6.title: 6. Third-Party Services
macropad.privacy.policy.section.6.desc: This app does not use any third-party services, analytics tools, or advertising networks that might collect data about you or your device.
macropad.privacy.policy.section.7.title: 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
macropad.privacy.policy.section.7.desc: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes to our practices or legal obligations. When we make updates, we will post the new Privacy Policy on this page and update the “Last updated” date.
macropad.privacy.policy.section.8.title: 8. Contact Us
macropad.privacy.policy.section.8.desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: innovative.technologies.polska@gmail.com.
macropad.privacy.policy.end: By using our app, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy. Thank you for trusting us with your privacy!
